name: Cauldron Brew
description:
Want to run your own witchy coffee shop? 

Cauldron Brew is a short coffee shop simulation where you can meet woodland customers, learn how to make drinks, and forage for ingredients!

Chill out to the sound of the woods whilst you concoct various coffee and tea orders in your cauldron. The customer's don't have the most straight-forward drink orders so you'll need to decipher their requests to ensure you pick the right ingredients. 

*hint* Click on the customer to toggle on and off a little drink order reminder!

This game is all hand-drawn, designed and developed by me, Holly Hudson! I'm a solo indie dev currently studying a masters in Games Design and Development at the National Film and Television School :)
